queries.sql: SELECT imb_id::integer AS id, jsonb_build_object('type', 'maison') AS tags, wkb_geometry AS geom FROM postgis_01_batiments WHERE imb_type = 'PA'
SELECT imb_id::integer AS id, jsonb_build_object('type', 'immeuble') AS tags, wkb_geometry AS geom FROM postgis_01_batiments WHERE imb_type = 'IM'
